name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Jira Epic Title on Timeline

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Jira Epic Title on Timeline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Jira experience with our "Show Jira Epic Title on Timeline" extension. This tool is designed to augment the Jira timeline UI by seamlessly integrating the title of each epic directly onto the timeline bars.

This extension brings the epic title right onto the timeline bar, making it instantly visible and easily accessible. No more eye tracing or confusion - the epic title you need is right where you need it.

Whether you're a project manager, a developer, or any team member who frequently uses Jira, this extension is designed to make your project tracking more intuitive and accessible.

Just install the extension, and the epic titles will automatically appear on your timeline. Enhance your productivity with "Show Jira Epic Title on Timeline" today!
